basics.name: Kono H. Lemke
basics.label: Physical Geochemist
basics.summary: Geochemist, with an interest in water at extreme conditions

work.name: Department of Earth Sciences, University of Hong Kong, Hong Kong, SAR
work.summary: Synopsis: I employ FT-ICR mass spectrometry, IRMPD spectroscopy and DFT theory to study ion clusters.
highlights: Courses taught: Fluid Solid Interactions (EASC2401), Geochemistry (EASC2406), WMDs: Science Proliferation, Terrorism (CCGL9033), Origins of Life (CCST9018)

awards.title: Nobel Prize in Physics
awards.summary: The Nobel Prizes are five separate prizes that, according to Alfred Nobel's will of 1895, are awarded to 'those who, during the preceding year, have conferred the greatest benefit to humankind.'
